Screen-based Linetypes

Toolbar / Icon:
       
Menu: View > Screen-based Linetypes
Shortcut: N, L
Commands: screenlinetype | nl

Description:

Toggles the linetype mode of the current drawing.
If the linetype mode is activated, linetypes are optimized for the computer screen. In this mode, all lines are displayed with a width of one pixel and all patterns are shown as fixed, pixel based patterns on screen. A dashed line is always visible as dashed line on screen.
If the linetype mode is off, linetypes are shown in drawing units (default).
